Class DaoHelper

java.lang.Object
com.epam.library.dao.DaoHelper
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable
public class DaoHelper extends Object implements AutoCloseable
Helps to perform transaction, creates dao object and returns connection to ConnectionPool
